text.autoconfig.HorseBuff.title: Horse Buff Config
text.autoconfig.HorseBuff.option.noWande:
Yes - saddled horses wont wander.
No - saddled horses will wander
text.autoconfig.HorseBuff.option.fairBre:
Yes - game uses alternate breeding algorithm.
No - game uses vanilla breeding algorithm
text.autoconfig.HorseBuff.option.portalP:
Yes - Allows you to travel through nether and end portals while mounted on horseback.
No - vanilla behavior
text.autoconfig.HorseBuff.option.pitchFa: Fade Horse when you look down
While you are mounted, the further you look down, the lower the opacity of the horse gets
text.autoconfig.HorseBuff.option.horseHe:
While you are mounted horse heads are angled an extra N degrees down
    0 is disabled
   30 is good for visibility and style
   45 is good for breaking necks
